section.title: Directory structure
section.programlisting: xmlroff area datatype docs examples io javadoc ubl expr fo libfo property util

section.title: xmlroff
section.para: This is the root directory of the xmlroff source code tree. It contains the .c and .h files for top-level, non-object source code as well as the .c and .h files for the top-level FoContext, FoObject and FoNode object types.
fo-context.[ch] are autogenerated (then modified).

section.title: xmlroff/area
section.para: Source code for area objects. None of these files are autogenerated.

section.title: xmlroff/datatype
section.para: Source code for datatype objects. None of these files are autogenerated.

section.title: xmlroff/docs
section.para: Documentation that is built using gtk-doc (which has a strong resemblance to Javadoc). A lot of the files are autogenerated by the gtk-doc tools.
xmlroff-property-{decl,ref}.ent are autogenerated by XSL stylesheets.

section.title: xmlroff/examples
section.para: Example configuration files for xmlroff and examples of xmlroff in action.

section.title: xmlroff/examples/io
section.para: Example command-line xmlroff applications that demonstrate the different ways of using the top-level interfaces to the 'libfo' library.

section.title: xmlroff/examples/javadoc
section.para: An example of using xmlroff to create PDF from Javadoc XML.

section.title: xmlroff/examples/ubl
section.para: An example of using xmlroff to format a UBL purchase order (PO).
Uses a stylesheet by Norman Walsh.

section.title: xmlroff/expr
section.para: Property value expression parser. None of these files are autogenerated.

section.title: xmlroff/fo
section.para: Source code for GObject objects corresponding to XSL formatting objects.
fo-*.c, fo-*.h, and fo-*-private.h are autogenerated but may have been additionally hand modified.
fo-*-area.[ch] are not autogenerated.
fo-tree*.[ch] are not autogenerated.
fo-inline-fo.[ch] and fo-block-fo.[ch] are not autogenerated.

section.title: xmlroff/libfo
section.para: Top-level interfaces for accessing the 'libfo' library.
None of the code is autogenerated.

section.title: xmlroff/property
section.para: Source code for GObject objects corresponding to XSL formatting object properties.
fo-property-*.[ch] are autogenerated, except for fo-property-eval.[ch].

section.title: xmlroff/util
section.para: Source code for GObject objects that are useful but which don't relate to anything in the XSL spec, e.g., an FoObject-ified hash table implementation.
None of the code is autogenerated.
